body:
I've put [a PR for this](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/1154). The schema I outlined above proved to be not quite realistic, so the actual schema implemented is slightly different. Specifically, `isHighPop` was replaced by `experimentType`, which takes the same value as experimentType in the main ping.

[This preview of the new documentation](https://github.com/mythmon/normandy/blob/32b3682772ca6e8f579e975d185cfdef91f45388/docs/user/data_collection.rst#enrollment) should be useful. @sunahsuh, @jaredkerim, @gregglind can you take a look at it? Does this meet your needs? I specifically tried to enumerate all the values of the enum-like fields for Gregg.

body_html:
I've put a PR for this. The schema I outlined above proved to be not quite realistic, so the actual schema implemented is slightly different. Specifically, isHighPop was replaced by experimentType, which takes the same value as experimentType in the main ping.

This preview of the new documentation should be useful. @sunahsuh, @jaredkerim, @gregglind can you take a look at it? Does this meet your needs? I specifically tried to enumerate all the values of the enum-like fields for Gregg.
